We need to parse relationships. Each statement: "X is Y's ancestor" means X is an ancestor of Y (i.e., X precedes Y). "X is Y's descendant" means X is descendant of Y (i.e., X follows Y). So we have a directed graph of ancestry.

Goal: relationship between Victoria and Isabella. Determine if one is ancestor/descendant of the other, share common ancestor, share common descendant, etc.
